rules.natural: If CompanyX develops DrugAlpha, then CompanyX profits.
If CompanyX modifies DrugAlpha, then FDA approval for CompanyX results in an FDA denial for CompanyX.
CompanyX modifies DrugAlpha or CompanyX modifies DrugBeta.
If CompanyX modifies DrugBeta, then FDA approval for CompanyX leads to an FDA denial for CompanyX.
If CompanyX detects severe side effects, then CompanyX does not halt the clinical trial.
If CompanyX detects mild side effects, then CompanyX does not halt the clinical trial.
If CompanyX acquires a competing patent, then CompanyX does not license DrugBeta.
If CompanyX publishes StudyBeta, then CompanyX profits.
If CompanyX tests DrugAlpha for ConditionGamma, then CompanyX develops DrugAlpha.
CompanyX tests DrugAlpha for ConditionGamma or CompanyX tests DrugBeta for ConditionGamma.
If CompanyX tests DrugBeta for ConditionGamma, then CompanyX synthesizes DrugBeta.
If CompanyX uses the AITool, then synthesis of DrugBeta by CompanyX results in publication of StudyBeta by CompanyX.
If CompanyX does not detect severe side effects and CompanyX does not detect mild side effects, then CompanyX continues the clinical trial.
If CompanyX does not detect severe side effects and CompanyX does not detect mild side effects, then CompanyX does not continue the clinical trial.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(patents(CompanyX, DrugAlpha) | (synthesizes(CompanyX, DrugBeta) -> publishes(CompanyX, StudyBeta))) -> licenses(CompanyX, DrugBeta))
rules.natural: If CompanyX does not patent DrugAlpha and synthesis of DrugBeta by CompanyX does not lead to publication of StudyBeta by CompanyX, then CompanyX licenses DrugBeta.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(tests(CompanyX, DrugBeta, ConditionGamma) -> publishes(CompanyX, StudyBeta)) -> halts(CompanyX, ClinicalTrial))
rules.natural: If testing DrugBeta for ConditionGamma by CompanyX does not result in publication of StudyBeta by CompanyX, then CompanyX halts the clinical trial.
If lack of profit by CompanyX does not lead to submission of an FDA application by CompanyX, then CompanyX receives FDA approval.
If lack of profit by CompanyX does not trigger submission of an FDA application by CompanyX, then CompanyX does not receive an FDA denial.
If CompanyX does not use the AITool, then CompanyX uses the ManualTool.
If CompanyX does not profit, then CompanyX does not submit an FDA application.

facts.natural: CompanyX does not use the ManualTool.

steps.natural: CompanyX uses the AITool.

CompanyX develops DrugAlpha or CompanyX publishes StudyBeta.
CompanyX profits.

(A1 → G).natural: If CompanyX develops DrugAlpha, then CompanyX profits.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: CompanyX develops DrugAlpha or CompanyX publishes StudyBeta.

(A10 → A9).natural: If CompanyX receives FDA approval, then CompanyX receives an FDA denial.

(A11 → (A10 → A9)).natural: If CompanyX modifies DrugAlpha, then FDA approval for CompanyX results in an FDA denial for CompanyX.
